title: 2 Simple Ways to Convert an RTF into a .DOCX File

steps.title: Open Microsoft Word.
steps.content: Open Microsoft Word. It's a blue app that looks like a book of writing with a white " W " on it.

steps.title: Click on File in the menu bar at the top of the screen.
steps.content: Click on File in the menu bar at the top of the screen.

steps.title: Click on Open….
steps.content: Click on Open… .

steps.title: Select the RTF file you want to convert.
steps.content: Select the RTF file you want to convert.

steps.title: Click on Open.
steps.content: Click on Open . The RTF file will open in Microsoft Word.

steps.title: Click on File in the menu bar at the top of the screen.
steps.content: Click on File in the menu bar at the top of the screen.

steps.title: Click on Save As….
steps.content: Click on Save As… .

steps.title: Click on the "File Format:" drop-down menu.
steps.content: Click on the " File Format:" drop-down menu. On some versions of Word, the file format drop-down menu isn't labeled. If so, simply click the drop-down menu that says "Rich Text Format (.rtf)" to select another file format.

steps.title: Click on Word Document (.docx).
steps.content: Click on Word Document (.docx) .

steps.title: Click on Save.
steps.content: Click on Save . The RTF file has been converted to a Microsoft Word document. If a warning regarding the document format pops up, click on OK .

steps.title: Go to https://docs.google.com in a browser.
steps.content: Go to https://docs.google.com in a browser. This opens the Google Docs website. If you're not logged in automatically, log in or create a free Google account.

steps.title: Click on .
steps.content: Click on . This plus symbol is located in the lower-right section of the page and creates a new document.

steps.title: Click on File in the upper-left of the window.
steps.content: Click on File in the upper-left of the window.

steps.title: Click on Open….
steps.content: Click on Open… .

steps.title: Click on the Upload tab at the top-center of the window.
steps.content: Click on the Upload tab at the top-center of the window.

steps.title: Click on Select a file from your computer in the center of the window.
steps.content: Click on Select a file from your computer in the center of the window.

steps.title: Select the RTF file you want to convert.
steps.content: Select the RTF file you want to convert.

steps.title: Click on File in the upper-left of the window.
steps.content: Click on File in the upper-left of the window.

steps.title: Click on Dowload As.
steps.content: Click on Dowload As .

steps.title: Click on Microsoft Word.
steps.content: Click on Microsoft Word .

steps.title: Name the document and click on Save.
steps.content: Name the document and click on Save . The RTF file has been saved a Microsoft Word document.
